document.masterDocTitle: The genus Colletes (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae) in Central Asia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The genus Colletes (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae) in Central Asia

subSubSection.paragraph:

–177, ♀, ♂ ( type locality: Areaxestal [Ordubad, Azerbaijan ]).

Published records. Noskiewicz ( 1936 : 176 ): Kazakhstan , Tajikistan , Turkmenistan , Uzbekistan ; Popov ( 1935 : 367 ); Popov ( 1949 : 689 ): Tajikistan ; Popov ( 1952 : 84 ); Ponomareva ( 1960 : 135 ): Turkmenistan ; Popov ( 1967 : 14 ): Tajikistan , Uzbekistan ; Kuhlmann ( 2005 : 1364 ); Kuhlmann ( 2009 a: 16 ): Kazakhstan , Uzbekistan , Kyrgyzstan , Turkmenistan , Tajikistan .
General distribution. Azerbaijan , Kazakhstan , Uzbekistan , Kyrgyzstan , Turkmenistan , Tajikistan , Afghanistan , China (Xinjiang).
